title: The Sims 4 - Get Together and Previous DLC
description:
The Sims 4: Get Together (c) Electronic Arts

VIDEO TUTORIAL with updated Links:

RELEASE DATE: 12/2015
PROTECTION:   Origin + DLC hell


This addon release includes all previous updates and DLC. Only the main game
  is required. The previously unreleased DLC 'Spooky Stuff' DLC has been
  included as a bonus.




Welcome to the beautiful new world of Windenburg, with picturesque landmarks
  to explore like the sprawling hedge maze at the garden chateau, alluring
  pools along the bluffs, and the mysterious ancient ruins. Visit local
  hotspots and grab a delicious espresso at the cafe, chat up your favourite
  crush at the pub, or dance the night away at the discotheque. Get together
  with other Sims for exciting group activities like thrilling games of
  foosball, lively midnight bonfires, super-secret dance parties, and more!
  You can also join different clubs with distinct personalities and style, to
  meet new Sims and live it up. In The Sims 4 Get Together* there's always a
  great reason to get together.

1. BEFORE YOU EVEN STAR DOWNLOADING ANYTHING! Exclude the following folders from your Anti-Virus Realtime Protection (or disable your anti virus completely if you prefer, instead), create them (empty)  if you don't have them already:
   1.1. Any folder you use to download torrents
   1.2. C:Program Files (x86)The Sims 4
   1.3. C:Program FilesThe Sims 4
   1.4. C:Program Files (x86)Electronic ArtsThe Sims 4
   1.5. C:Program FilesElectronic ArtsThe Sims 4

2. Download the Base Game torrent and the Get Together torrent from the links provided in the video's description at YouTube
   
3. Install the Base Game, if you don't already have it properly set up (remember to install everything by right clicking the installers and selecting "run as administrator"):

   3.1. Install the Visual C# Runtime Libraries found inside of the folder # Visual C# Runtime Libraries, according to the order they are there, if you already have some of them installed, the system will show you a message and you can just close the installer and install the others, until you are sure you have all of them;

   3.2. Install the base game by running "The_Sims_4_Setup.exe" as Administrator;
   
   3.3. MOVE the folder C:Program Files (x86)Electronic ArtsThe Sims 4 to C:Program Files (x86)The Sims 4 [or the same thing, without the "(x86)", if you are using a 32 bits Windows]

4. Install Get Together

   4.1. Mount the "The Sims 4 - 01 Get Together and Previous DLC" by double clicking it (Windows 8 or newer), or by using your favorite disk imaging tool (Previous versions of Windows);

   4.2. Right click "Setup.exe" and run it as administrator, using the default options;

   4.3. Finish installing (no need to run the vcredist shown by the installer, since you already did that on step 3.1)

5. Crack the Game

   5.1. Copy all the files inside "# CrackGameBin" folder (from the Get Together ISO) to "C:Program Files (x86)The Sims 4" [or the same folder without the (x86) if you are using a 32 bits version of Windows]

6. Create the Shortcut

   6.1. Right click the file "C:Program Files (x86)The Sims 4GameBinTS4_x64" if you are using a 64 bits version of Windows, or "C:Program FilesThe Sims 4GameBinTS4.exe" if you are using a 32 bits version, then COPY;

   6.2 Paste the shorcut wherever you want, like the desktop, for example;

   6.3 Right click the newly created shortcut, click "Properties", then "Compatibility", then "Change Settings for All Users", then "Run this program as an Administrator";

7. Enjoy the game!!!
